titles.title: 612 I Give My Heart To Thee (familiar easy tune)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I give my heart to Thee
O Jesus most desired
And heart for heart
The gift shall be
For Thou my heart
Hast fired

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thou hearts alone wouldst move
Thou only hearts dost love
I would love Thee
As Thou lov'st me
O Jesus most desired

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
What off'ring can I make
Dear Lord to love like Thine
That Thou the Word
Didst stoop to take
A human form like mine

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
"Give me thy heart My son"
Lord Thou my heart hast won
I would love Thee
As Thou lov'st me
O Jesus most desired

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Thy heart is opened wide
Its offered love most free
Thy heart to heart I may abide
And hide myself in Thee

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Ah how Thy love doth burn
Till I that love return
I would love Thee
As Thou lov'st me
O Jesus most desired

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Here finds my heart its rest
Repose that knows no shock
The strength of love
That keeps it blest
In Thee the riven Rock

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
My soul as girt around
Her citadel hath found
I would love Thee
As Thou lov'st me
O Jesus most desired
